headline: A Look At PNC Financial Services Group (PNC) Valuation After Record Results And Strong Earnings Beat
summary: PNC Financial Services Group (PNC) is in focus after reporting fourth quarter and full year 2025 results that topped analyst expectations, with record revenue and strong earnings per share growth lifting the stock. See our latest analysis for PNC Financial Services Group. At a share price of $223.18, PNC has logged a 6.2% 1 month share price return and a 22.7% 3 month share price return, while the 1 year total shareholder return of 15.6% and 5 year total shareholder return of 76.4% point to...
